definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="312" y="125"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">voice</field><field name="sound">CUSTOM:notice</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">-----------------------------------------</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">服务器给所有玩家发送公告：</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="get_command_parameter_message"><field name="param">content</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">-----------------------------------------</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
